Explore our wide range of natural supplements and vitamins made with your health and well-being in mind. Select the category and let us take care of the rest. No More Product 21,604 people love us on We did all the hard work so you don't have to --- from years of scientific research to scouring the globe for finest ingredients. All that's left for you to do is reap the benefits of the best nature has to offer. All our products are manufactured in the USA in GMP certified facilities. Each formula we produce undergoes rigorous scientific & quality control standards and passes quality tests from 3rd Party Independent Labs. All testing results and the labs we use are kept confidential due to the proprietary information included in the reports. Results are independently verified and our product badges may apply to different products. Not sure what each of those amazing ingredients can help you with? You can find all the answers below. Black seed oil comes from a small plant (Nigella sativa) with pale purple, blue or white flowers that grows in Western Asia, Middle East, and Eastern Europe. Ashwagandha root (Withania somnifera) is a non-toxic herb that has been used for centuries in traditional medicines in India. It is an evergreen shrub found in Africa and India. Kava is a tall shrub in the pepper family that grows in the Pacific islands. The root of the plant is used to produce a drink with sedative, anaesthetic, and... Turmeric is a flowering herbaceous plant of the ginger family, native to the Indian subcontinent and Southeast Asia Ginkgo biloba is a tree native to China, its leaves have been used for thousands of years in traditional Chinese medicine. Bladderwrack is a brown seaweed found on the coasts of the North Sea, the western Baltic Sea and the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans. Selenium is an essential mineral that must be obtained through your diet or supplementation. Iodine is an essential mineral that ensures healthy thyroid function. Human body doesn't produce iodine, so it has to be taken with food or supplements.
